pr_title: HBASE-24221 addendum to restore public interface on LoadIncrementalHFiles

timeline.bodyText: Will be removed as part of 3.0.0/4.0.0 ?
timeline.author: virajjasani
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -803,14 +803,35 @@ private boolean checkHFilesCountPerRegionPerFamily( *

* Protected for testing. * @return empty list if success, list of items to retry on recoverable failure + * @deprecated as of release 2.3.0. Use {@link BulkLoadHFiles} instead.

replies.bodyText: Unnecessary, I think, because the whole class already has this comment.
replies.author: ndimiduk
